title: "Fintech start-up Jiraaf raises $8.7 m in Series B funding"
excerpt: "Fintech start-up Jiraaf (owned by AI Growth) has raised $8.7 million in equity as part of a Series B funding round. The round was co-led by Accel and Harmony Partners and also saw participation from Capital A and other angel investors, said the company."
